name: Vadim Suharnikov
summary: Enthusiastic about learning new technologies and solving complex problems. Adept at creating robust and scalable systems using Python and Golang.
about: Seasoned software engineer with over a decade of experience in backend development and infrastructure management. Proven track record in delivering high-impact projects such as VPN services and virtual data center solutions. Skilled in Python, Golang, and optimizing system performance.

education.school: Moscow Technical University of Communications and Informatics
education.degree: Specialist Engineer in Communications and Informatics

work.title: Senior Software Engineer / Technical Lead
work.description: Developed and maintained backend services for a remote team collaboration platform. Implemented new features and improved existing systems. Collaborated with cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality software.

work.title: Senior Software Engineer
work.description: Engineered an interactive sales system. Enhanced and maintained subscription and transaction systems.Provided ongoing support for legacy code.

work.title: Senior Software Engineer
work.description: Implemented backend for VDC web service. Developed and maintained VPN service. Created Terraform provider for managing infrastructure. Maintained multiple Python microservices.

work.title: Software Engineer / Solution Architect
work.description: Developed liquidity generation systems using Python and Golang. Designed and implemented clearing systems for banking transactions. Built an account monitoring system with real-time analytics.

work.title: Software Engineer
work.description: Developed the core of a car rental service using Golang and Python.

work.title: Software Engineer
work.description: Implemented customer data collection service using Python and Elasticsearch. Created a data compression service to optimize MongoDB storage.Integrated external services for ticket sales systems.
